sen.j: 尾上 芙雀（おのえ ふじゃく）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Fujaku ONOE is a professional name used by a succession of Kabuki actors.
Fujaku ONOE is a professional name used by a succession of Kabuki actors.
Fujaku ONOE is a professional name used by a succession of Kabuki actors.
- Shinshichi ONOE I used the name Fujaku as his offstage name.
Shinshichi ONOE I used the name Fujaku as his offstage name.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: Shinshichi ONOE I used the name Fujaku as his offstage name.
- Shinshichi ONOE II used the name Fujaku as his offstage name.

sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: Shinshichi ONOE II used the name Fujaku as his offstage name.
- He was the younger brother of Shinshichi ONOE II.
He was the younger brother of Shinshichi ONOE II.
He was the younger brother of Shinshichi ONOE II.
